member.name: ID3D12GraphicsCommandList2.WriteBufferImmediate
member.summary: Writes a number of 32-bit immediate values to the specified buffer locations directly from the command stream.
member.param: The number of structures that are pointed to by pParams and pModes.
The address of an array containing a number of structures equal to Count.

The address of an array containing a number of structures equal to Count. The default value is null; passing null causes the system to write all immediate values using D3D12_WRITEBUFFERIMMEDIATE_MODE_DEFAULT.

summary.para: Encapsulates a list of graphics commands for rendering, extending the interface to support writing immediate values directly to a buffer.
summary.div: Note This interface was introduced in the Windows 10 Fall Creators Update, and as such is the latest version of the ID3D12GraphicsCommandList interface. Applications targeting the Windows 10 Fall Creators Update and later should use this interface instead of or .
